New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest half-century in T20Is off 52 balls
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's 92 off 64 balls was a key performance for India
Axar Patel's sensational catch on the boundary was a turning point in Australia's chase
Kuldeep Yadav's googly bowled Glenn Maxwell and broke the partnership between Maxwell and Head
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was praised for his selflessness and attacking game
India captain Rohit Sharma said that his team's performance was a result of their hard work and dedication
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Daren Sammy Stadium in St Lucia
Australia needed Bangladesh to beat Afghanistan in order to make the final four
India will play England in the second semi-final in Guyana
